recent.text: RT @frontendyork: 6 spots left at our event next week! Please make sure to RSVP as we're going to be very limited on space! Who knew gettin‚Ä¶

Next week I'll be visiting York to talk about @Netlify and the #JAMstack at @frontendyork's end of year bonanza!

(Both the "York" and the "Bonanza" parts of this fill me with glee!)

Be quick to grab your place if you are keen to join us there.

https://t.co/sjmTs4pj8e

To say that I'm proud of my sister, and inspired by all the tireless work she does to help the homeless in Mountain View, would be a huge understatement.

So it's nice to see one of the organisations she volunteers at send her this virtual hug. ‚ô•Ô∏è

Just what is the #JAMstack anyway?

@biilmann and I sheltered from the rain to chat with @thenewstack. https://t.co/PMqse4jskX

I can only assume that either:

a. He's a fucking idiot
b. He's in the pocket of the coal industry
c. All of the above

Either way, I wonder what recoverable damage this fool will do to us all. https://t.co/IwZnFHZm9B

Happy 1st birthday, @eleven_ty!
My, how you've grown!

Genuine kudos to @zachleat for his work on this. A side project managed with the upmost care and respect. I find much to learn from how Zach works with the community and manages the project. Hats off!

Delighted to see this launching!

When your infrastructure spans multiple cloud providers around the world, and you normalise things to simplify the work for developers, delivering IPv6 support is far from trivial. Interesting insights from the @netlify team in this post. https://t.co/VBzA7Si6JU
Looking forward to this. Also expect some great insights from @stefanjudis on the evolution of the modern web stack. https://t.co/noGkGimzLm

Just popping in to Vegas for @awscloud's #reInvent with 44,000 of my closest friends.

You know what they say, "What happens in Pocklington, stays in Pocklington"

Looking forward to heading to back to my home town of York, to join the @frontendyork meetup. There aren't many places available, so move fast if you want to join us for talks on kanban from @srwestons, performance from @AndyCallaghan, and on @Netlify and the #JAMstack from me. https://t.co/QyYxrZICu6

Got questions about @Netlify?

Maybe you want to know how to use a feature.
Or how something works behind the scenes.

Whatever your questions, @futuregerald and I are planning to have a go at answering them. Just ask.
